error.message: Call to deprecated function file_default_scheme(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::config('system.file')->get('default_scheme') instead.
Call to deprecated constant FILE_EXISTS_REPLACE: Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::EXISTS_REPLACE.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function file_unmanaged_delete_recursive(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::deleteRecursive().
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead create a \Drupal\Core\Url object directly, for example using Url::fromRoute().

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Call to deprecated function libraries_get_path(): Will be removed before a stable Drupal 8 release. Please use the new library load and managment concepts described at: https://www.drupal.org/node/2170763

Call to deprecated function libraries_get_path(): Will be removed before a stable Drupal 8 release. Please use the new library load and managment concepts described at: https://www.drupal.org/node/2170763

Call to deprecated method getUsername() of class Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::getAccountName() or \Drupal\user\UserInterface::getDisplayName() instead.

Call to deprecated function libraries_get_path(): Will be removed before a stable Drupal 8 release. Please use the new library load and managment concepts described at: https://www.drupal.org/node/2170763

Call to deprecated function libraries_get_path(): Will be removed before a stable Drupal 8 release. Please use the new library load and managment concepts described at: https://www.drupal.org/node/2170763
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to bulk_content_operation.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
